scripts.run:android:release: npm run clean:android && npm run generate:android:bundle && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -target MatrixFilterConstructor -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator clean && rm -rf build
scripts.start: rm -rf out && cd src && dotnet fable npm-run watch
scripts.build:release: rm -rf out && cd src && dotnet fable npm-run build
scripts.generate:android:signing-key: keytool -genkey -v -keystore mfc.keystore -alias mfc -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && mv mfc.keystore android/app
scripts.generate:android:apk: npm run generate:android:bundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.generate:android:bundle: npm run build:release && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.extract:docker:apk: docker create -ti --name mfc-android-container mfc-android.image /bin/bash && docker cp mfc-android-container:/package/MatrixFilterConstructor/android/app/build/outputs/apk/app-release.apk mfc.apk && docker rm -fv mfc-android-container
scripts.build:release:docker: npm run build:docker:image && npm run extract:docker:apk
